mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (report_type, report_content, job_id, pf_id, comment_id, user_id) VALUES (#{reportType}, #{reportContent}, #{jobId}, #{pfId}, #{commentId}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE report SET report_type = #{pfContent}, report_content = #{pfAgerating}, job_id = #{pfDate}, pf_id = #{pfBookingmethod}, comment_id = #{pfProduction}, user_id = #{pfLocation} WHERE report_id = #{reportId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE report SET report_status = 'deleted' WHERE report_id = #{reportId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM report r WHERE r.report_id=LAST_INSERT_ID()
